definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: For a certain lexical item, its argument structure or valency structure determines its syntactic structure.
sentences.chinese: 對詞項而言，主目結構或配價結構決定句法結構。

sentences.english: Analyzed with its lexical valence components, Shi should be a verb of two valences .
sentences.chinese: 從配價成分分析，“使”應是一個二價動詞。

sentences.english: The semantic and syntactic notions of valency need not coincide.
sentences.chinese: 語義配價與句法配價之間沒有必然的一一對應的關係。

sentences.english: The semantic and syntactic notions of valency need not coincide.
sentences.chinese: 語義配價與句法配價之間沒有必然的一一對應的關係。

sentences.english: Part Four looks at reciprocal verbs from the point of view of valency.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分對相互動詞進行配價分析。
